projects.name: Design Dashboard
projects.description: A dedicated design dashboard that serves as both a portfolio showcase and source of truth for active design projects
designGoals: Create centralized visibility into design work across projects
Enable stakeholders to access design rationale without hunting
Reduce designer overhead in communicating design decisions
Bridge design work with PM dashboard for project context

designPrinciples.title: Context Before Details
designPrinciples.description: Show goals, principles, and insights prominently before diving into deliverables
designPrinciples.rationale: All personas need 'why' before 'what'. Without context, deliverables are just files.

designPrinciples.title: Summaries with Easy Depth
designPrinciples.description: Never force users to open full documents to understand content
designPrinciples.rationale: PMs and Executives don't have time to open every file. Summaries must be self-sufficient with depth on demand.

designPrinciples.title: Status Transparency
designPrinciples.description: Always show project status and last updated date
designPrinciples.rationale: Trust erodes when users can't tell if information is current. Transparency builds trust.

designPrinciples.title: Design-Focused with Context Awareness
designPrinciples.description: Stay focused on design artifacts and decisions, while acknowledging the broader project ecosystem
designPrinciples.rationale: Dashboard succeeds by doing one thing well: making design work visible. Simple links to related tools (footer/nav) provide context without feature creep.

designPrinciples.title: Design Work is Storytelling
designPrinciples.description: Organize deliverables chronologically by phase to tell the design story
designPrinciples.rationale: Users need to understand design progression from Research → Concepts → Production → QA.

deliverables.title: User Personas
deliverables.summary: Four primary personas identified: Sarah (Lead Designer), Marcus (Product Manager), Jen (Software Engineer), Alex (Executive). All share common pain: design work is invisible and inaccessible.

deliverables.title: Design Principles
deliverables.summary: Five core principles established: Context Before Details, Summaries with Easy Depth, Status Transparency, Respect the PM Dashboard, Design Work is Storytelling.

deliverables.title: Key Insights
deliverables.summary: Nine critical insights from research including: visibility paradox, context is king, visual content is critical for design communication, and more.

deliverables.title: Brief Evolution (v1.0 → v1.1)
deliverables.summary: Research iteration discovering inline visual review as core capability. Updated brief to make dashboard a visual design review hub, not just file organization.

deliverables.title: Mood Board
deliverables.summary: Visual direction establishing dark-mode-first aesthetic, color palette (neutral grays with blue accent), typography (Inter), and layout patterns inspired by Linear, Notion, Storybook, and Figma.

visualAssets.preview: Interactive HTML with color swatches, typography samples, and visual references

deliverables.title: Projects List Wireframe
deliverables.summary: Low-fidelity HTML wireframe showing projects list view with sidebar navigation, phase filters, and project cards displaying status, metadata, and deliverable counts.

deliverables.title: Project Detail Wireframe
deliverables.summary: Low-fidelity HTML wireframe for project detail view showing context-before-details pattern: design principles and insights prominently displayed above deliverables with inline visual previews.

visualAssets.preview: Interactive HTML wireframe with visual content display

deliverables.title: File Viewer Modal Wireframe
deliverables.summary: Interactive wireframe showing inline file viewing modal. When users click 'View File' on a deliverable, content opens in an overlay modal with navigation, keyboard shortcuts, and close actions - keeping users in context instead of navigating away.

visualAssets.preview: Interactive modal with file content display

deliverables.title: Design Tokens
deliverables.summary: Code-ready design tokens including colors, typography, spacing (8px system), layout values, shadows, transitions, and breakpoints. Exports as ES modules with CSS custom property generation.

deliverables.title: Design Specification
deliverables.summary: Comprehensive 60+ page specification covering all components (6), screens (2), responsive behavior, interactions, animations, accessibility (WCAG AA), and developer handoff. Includes exact measurements, all states, edge cases, and performance targets.

deliverables.title: Component Implementation Guide
deliverables.summary: Working Lit 3.x web component code for 5 core components (sidebar, project card, deliverable card, button, context section) plus 2 view examples. Includes setup instructions, design token integration, and testing patterns.

keyInsights: Design work is valuable but invisible to stakeholders
Context (why) is more valuable than artifacts (what) alone
One dashboard serves four distinct jobs-to-be-done
Summaries enable scanning, details enable work
Design tells a story from research to validation
Design Dashboard and PM Dashboard serve complementary purposes
Visual content is critical - design work cannot be communicated through text alone
